column1: 17621,Marvel Adventures the Avengers (2006) #20,20,5666,224,"The arrival of ANT-MAN! Hank Pym has gone missing from his lab at Van Dyne Industries, and it's up to his most famous experiment-the gorgeous Giant-Girl-to track him down. But when Giant-Girl finds herself stuck in the middle of a very bizarre love triangle, it's time for the world's tiniest super hero to make his diminutive debut! Will he be able to prove that size doesn't really matter?,2008,1
